TABLE.NAME: local_nudge
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores instances of Nudge that indicate and provide metadata for Courses who want Nudge reminders

FIELD.NAME: createdby
FIELD.COMMENT: The user that created this Nudge instance.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: A timestamp for when this Nudge instance was created.

FIELD.NAME: lastmodifiedby
FIELD.COMMENT: The last user that modified this Nudge instance.

FIELD.NAME: lastmodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this Nudge instance was modified.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course that this nudge instance is linked to.

FIELD.NAME: linkedlearnernotificationid
FIELD.COMMENT: The has one for a nudge_notification that will be sent to the Learner on nudge trigger.

FIELD.NAME: linkedmanagernotificationid
FIELD.COMMENT: The has one for a nudge_notification that will be sent to the Manager on nudge trigger.

FIELD.NAME: isenabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates that this nudge instance is enabled and ready to send messages.

FIELD.NAME: reminderrecipient
FIELD.COMMENT: Enum indicating who should receive reminders from this Nudge instance. See the local_nudge\\local\\nudge for details.

FIELD.NAME: remindertype
FIELD.COMMENT: Enum representing this nudge's method of determining the appropriate date to nudge on.

FIELD.NAME: remindertypefixeddate
FIELD.COMMENT: See entity comment on local_nudge\\local\\nudge

FIELD.NAME: remindertypeperiod
FIELD.COMMENT: See entity comment on local_nudge\\local\\nudge

KEY.NAME: linkedlearnernotificationkey
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key constraint for a nudge_notification for the learner.

KEY.NAME: linkedmanagernotificationkey
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key constraint for a nudge_notification for the manager.

TABLE.NAME: local_nudge_notification
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores instances of a Nudge Notification. A nudge notification has many 'nudge_notification_content's to store translation for each language.

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: Title for this notification template.

FIELD.NAME: createdby
FIELD.COMMENT: The user that created this Nudge Notification instance.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: A timestamp for when this Nudge Notification instance was created.

FIELD.NAME: lastmodifiedby
FIELD.COMMENT: The last user that modified this Nudge Notification instance.

FIELD.NAME: lastmodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this Nudge Notification instance was modified.

FIELD.NAME: userfromid
FIELD.COMMENT: A has one to an instance of user that this notification can be sent from. Will use core's no-reply user if null.

KEY.NAME: userfromkey
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key constraint for has one to user.

TABLE.NAME: local_nudge_notif_content
TABLE.COMMENT: 'nudge_notification_content's have one nudge_notification and provide translations/content for it.

FIELD.NAME: createdby
FIELD.COMMENT: The user that created this Nudge Notification Content instance.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: A timestamp for when this Nudge Notification Content instance was created.

FIELD.NAME: lastmodifiedby
FIELD.COMMENT: The last user that modified this Nudge Notification Content instance.

FIELD.NAME: lastmodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this Nudge Notification Content instance was modified.

FIELD.NAME: nudgenotificationid
FIELD.COMMENT: has one to a nudge_notification

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: Language for this notification content

FIELD.NAME: subject
FIELD.COMMENT: Subject for this notification content

FIELD.NAME: body
FIELD.COMMENT: Body content for this nudge notification

TABLE.NAME: local_nudge_user
TABLE.COMMENT: This table joins between a nudge instance and a user to keep track of the recurrence time if relative to the users enrollment date.

FIELD.NAME: createdby
FIELD.COMMENT: The user that created this Nudge User instance.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: A timestamp for when this Nudge User instance was created.

FIELD.NAME: lastmodifiedby
FIELD.COMMENT: The last user that modified this Nudge User instance.

FIELD.NAME: lastmodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this Nudge User instance was modified.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: has_one to user.

FIELD.NAME: nudgeid
FIELD.COMMENT: has one to nudge.

FIELD.NAME: recurrancetime
FIELD.COMMENT: Used to track individual enrollments for recurring notifications.
